author: Ukrainska Pravda
title: Ukraine remains attractive for business despite war, German minister says | Ukrainska Pravda
text:
Ukraine remains attractive for business despite war, German minister says Ivanna Kostina ‚Äî Saturday, 4 May 2024, 14:17 28
Svenja Schulze. Stock photo: Getty Images Ukraine has remained attractive as a business destination even in times of war.
Source : Svenja Schulze, Germany's Minister for Economic Cooperation and Development, in an interview with Ukrinform news agency, as reported by European Pravda
Details : "Despite the current challenging situation, Ukraine remains an appealing market for many companies," Schulze said.
Advertisement: The official explained that it is still possible to run a production process in a large part of the country and that Ukraine's status as a candidate for EU membership is a "long-term" advantage for companies.
The minister cited data from the German-Ukrainian Chamber of Industry and Commerce, which indicates that about 2,000 companies with German capital were operating in Ukraine before the full-scale Russian invasion.
"Even after the Russian invasion, almost no companies have completely ceased operations in Ukraine. They keep their foot in the door because they know it's worth it," Schulze emphasised.
However, Schulze noted that the private sector needs a positive investment climate and legal certainty. Therefore, Germany supports Ukraine on its reform path, especially in view of the EU accession process. The official stressed that the anti-corruption efforts are critical. She mentioned a report by Transparency International that indicated progress in this area, even though Russian aggression still rages on. This is a very positive signal for the economy, the minister stressed.
Her ministry has been hosting the Platform for the Reconstruction of Ukraine for a year now, which seeks to engage civil society, the private sector, academia and municipalities in Germany that would like to contribute to Ukraine's recovery or are already doing so. So far, over 600 organisations have registered on the platform and are exchanging ideas.
Background:
The German Federal Government earlier approved a 15-point plan for Ukraine's economic recovery. In April, German Vice Chancellor Robert Habeck pledged that German companies were ready to immediately join the rebuilding of Ukraine's energy infrastructure, which was severely damaged by Russian attacks. Support UP or become our patron !
Advertisement:

organizations.name: german-ukrainian chamber of industry and commerce

author: @CTVMontreal
title: Husband runs over wife, 80, twice in Montreal hospital parking lot | CTV News
text: An 80-year-old woman is recovering after she was run over twice by the car being driven by her husband in a Montreal hospital parking lot. Around 11:45 a.m. on Thursday, the woman and her 83-year-old husband had just come out of the CHUM (Centre hospitalier de l'Universite de Montreal) hospital downtown and they were heading to their car in the hospital parking lot, Montreal police (SPVM) spokesperson Constable Sabrina Gauthier told CTV News. The woman fell before she got into the vehicle, Gauthier explained. For some reason, the driver did not wait for the woman to get inside before starting the car. "He ran over something and realized it as he backed out of the parking spot," Gauthier said, "then drove forward over the object again, not realizing until he got out of the car that it was his wife and that he had run her over twice." Police say the man was not intoxicated at the time and there is no criminal element being investigated. The woman was sent to the hospital in critical condition. Police confirmed later in the evening that her life is out of danger. author: Gabby Allen
title: Fire breaks out at 3-story apartment complex in Fairfax County
text:
DC News Now Washington Fire breaks out at 3-story apartment complex in Fairfax County Gabby Allen Thu, December 19, 2024 at 10:08 PM UTC
FAIRFAX COUNTY, Va. ( DC News Now ) ‚Äî Crews with Fairfax County Fire and Rescue were at the scene of an apartment complex fire in Reston on Thursday afternoon.
In a post on X made at 4:45 p.m., the department said the 2-alarm fire was at a three-story garden-style apartment building in the 16000 block of Becontree Lane.
PHOTOS: Owl ‚Äòdrops in‚Äô through chimney of Arlington home to become Christmas tree‚Äôs new star
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement When crews arrived, smoke was showing from the top floor.
The fire was under control by 5 p.m., and officials were working to put out remaining hotspots.
No injuries were reported.

title: TIEMPO ALICANTE HOY | Aviso amarillo por calor hoy en el interior de Alicante y leve bajada de las temperaturas para el fin de semana
text:
Patricia P√°ramo
02 AGO 2024 11:00 Actualizada 02 AGO 2024 11:03 El calor contin√∫a en el inicio del mes de agosto en la provincia de Alicante. Concretamente, las altas temperaturas pondr√°n en aviso amarillo al interior de la provincia, donde los term√≥metros llegar√°n a los 38 grados , seg√∫n la predicci√≥n de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a ( AEMET).
Para este viernes se espera cielo poco nuboso por la ma√±ana, tendiendo por la tarde a intervalos nubosos. Por la ma√±ana, intervalos de nubes bajas en el litoral; durante la segunda mitad del d√≠a, no se descartan chubascos o tormentas ocasionales en el interior de Alicante .
¬øTe imaginas huir del calor y pasar las vacaciones con chaqueta? Este es el mejor lugar para hacerlo
Las temperaturas ir√°n hoy en ligero descenso en el interior y norte de Alicante, y con pocos cambios en el resto. Viento flojo variable, tendiendo por la tarde a componente este con intervalos de moderado.
02/08 09:01 #AEMET #FMA nivel naranja por tormentas y/o temp. max para hoy en C. Valenciana, Arag√≥n, Catalu√±a y Andaluc√≠a . . Imagen en vigor a las 09:01 (tabla actualizada haciendo CLIC EN LA IMAGEN), o visite https://t.co/aIJV7DDYto https://t.co/wfYEITLrki
‚Äî AEMET (@AEMET_Esp) August 2, 2024 Seg√∫n el mapa de niveles de riesgo para la salud del Ministerio de Sanidad el interior de la provincia de Alicante estar√° este viernes en riesgo bajo (nivel 1), mientras que el resto estar√° sin riesgo (nivel 0) . As√≠ pues, para el interior la temperatura umbral est√° fijada en 35,2¬∫C cuando est√° previsto que hoy se alcancen los 37,8¬∫C, ma√±ana los 32,3¬∫C y el domingo los 34,1¬∫C.
Durante las semanas del 5 al 25 de agosto es probable que contin√∫e el tiempo c√°lido y con pocas lluvias.
Toda la informaci√≥n, en nuestra predicci√≥n para las pr√≥ximas tres semanas. https://t.co/JPcApGfIsL
‚Äî AEMET (@AEMET_Esp) August 2, 2024 En cuanto al sistema de vigilancia de temperaturas extremas en la Comunidad Valenciana , algunos puntos d el interior (Alcoy o o Cocentaina) est√°n hoy en riesgo medio mientras que la mayor√≠a del resto estar√° en riesgo bajo.
El tiempo en Alicante El viernes los term√≥metros llegar√°n hasta los 33¬∫C y se mantendr√°n as√≠ durante todo el d√≠a. Las m√≠nimas ser√°n de 23 grados. La capital de la provincia experimentar√° hoy otra noche ecuatorial con valores que rondar√°n los 25 grados.
Treinta y cuatro fallecidos en la provincia de Alicante en julio por las olas de calor
El tiempo en Elche Este viernes los term√≥metros llegar√°n hasta los 35¬∫C de m√°xima a las 14.00 horas. Las m√≠nimas ser√°n de 23 grados.
El tiempo en Benidorm En Benidorm durante las horas centrales de la jornada los term√≥metros llegar√°n a los 31¬∫C aunque la sensaci√≥n t√©rmica ser√° algo superior. Cielos despejados durante todo el d√≠a. Las m√≠nimas ser√°n de 23 grados.
El tiempo en Elda En Elda el cielo estar√° despejado por la ma√±ana y se cubrir√° por la tarde. Los term√≥metros llegar√°n a los 37¬∫C a mediod√≠a y se mantendr√°n en estos valores durante casi toda la jornada. Las m√≠nimas ser√°n de 21 grados.
Un hombre intenta aliviar el calor en una playa de Alicante / Jose Navarro
El tiempo en Torrevieja Este municipio de la Vega Baja tendr√° el cielo despejado todo el d√≠a y los valores ser√°n de 30¬∫C durante todo el d√≠a. Las m√≠nimas ser√°n de 25 grados.
El tiempo en Orihuela Los term√≥metros en Orihuela llegar√°n hoy a los 36¬∫C y as√≠ se mantendr√°n durante pr√°cticamente todo el d√≠a aunque por la noche los term√≥metros bajar√°n considerablemente hasta quedarse por debajo de los 27¬∫C. Las m√≠nimas ser√°n de 23.
El tiempo en Villena Las m√°ximas de toda la provincia se esperan hoy Villena , donde los term√≥metros podr√≠an alcanzar los 40 grados y las m√≠nimas bajar√°n hasta los 17 grados. Podr√≠an darse chubascos aislados durante la parte central del d√≠a.
El tiempo en D√©nia El norte de la provincia de Alicante experimentar√° durante la jornada de hoy temperaturas que en D√©nia llegar√°n a los 32 grados. Las m√≠nimas ser√°n de 24.
Las fuentes de Alicante, el oasis perfecto para huir del calor en la ciudad Pilar Cort√©s
El tiempo para el fin de semana El cielo de la Comunitat Valenciana estar√° este fin de semana despejado en general tras los chubascos e incluso tormentas que se esperan para este viernes, mientras el intenso calor de los √∫ltimos d√≠as dar√° un leve respiro o, al menos, dejar√°n de subir las temperaturas, seg√∫n la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a.
Para el s√°bado se espera cielo poco nuboso o despejado con intervalos nubosos de evoluci√≥n diurna por la tarde en el interior, con temperaturas m√≠nimas con pocos cambios y m√°ximas en descenso en el tercio sur y sin cambios en el resto. El viento soplar√° flojo variable, tendiendo por la tarde a este y sureste flojo con intervalos de moderado en el litoral.
As√≠ resiste Elche al calor
Ver galer√≠a As√≠ resiste Elche al calor /
Y el domingo , Aemet pronostica predominio de cielo poco nuboso o despejado. En el interior, intervalos nubosos de evoluci√≥n diurna y baja probabilidad de chubascos dispersos por la tarde. Las temperaturas, sin cambios significativos , y el viento, flojo variable, tendiendo por la tarde a viento de componente este flojo con intervalos de moderado en el litoral.
Pron√≥stico mar√≠timo Aguas costeras de Alicante: viento de componente sur de fuerza 2 a 4, rolando a norte y noreste en el norte y a componente este en el resto a partir de la noche. Marejadilla.
Aguas costeras de Castell√≥n: viento del noreste de fuerza 3 a 4, arreciando a 4 a 5 por la tarde. Marejadilla aumentando a marejada.
Aguas costeras de Valencia: viento del este y noreste de fuerza 3, rolando a componente norte de fuerza 3 a 4 por la noche. Marejadilla aumentando a marejada al final.
TEMAS

author: Meredith Deliso
title: NYPD officers help rescue man who fell onto subway tracks - ABC7 New York
text: Two New York City police officers helped save a man who had fallen onto the subway tracks this week -- marking their second dramatic rescue in recent months. The NYPD officers were conducting an inspection at the Carroll Street F/G subway station early Tuesday when they saw a man lose his footing and fall onto the subway tracks, police said. The officers ran toward the 55-year-old man, who was standing up but unable to get back onto the platform and was complaining of pain, body camera footage of the incident released on Wednesday shows. One officer jumped down onto the tracks to help support him while the second officer pulled the man back onto the platform, the footage shows. The second officer then helped pull his colleague back onto the platform. The entire incident took place in just under a minute, based on the body camera. "I fell, I must have slipped off," the man can be heard telling the officers in the footage. EMS crews transported the man to a local hospital with reports of hip and body pain, police said. The officers were not injured in the incident. The same officers were involved in a rescue at a Brooklyn pier in October, the NYPD said. They responded to a 911 call of a person possibly in the water in Erie Basin on the evening of Oct. 3. Along with the Harbor Unit, the officers rescued a 20-year-old woman who was trapped in the water clinging onto a pier, police said. She was transported to a local hospital in stable condition.

locations.name: new york two new york city

author: Jannat Un Nisa
title: Google Has Pulled The Plug On uBlock Origin
text:
Google has escalated its efforts against ad blockers across its services, implementing changes to its browser extension framework.
Google Chrome has recently shifted its extension support from the Manifest V2 framework to the new Manifest V3 framework. This shift represents a major change for extensions, particularly those like uBlock Origin, which have been widely used for ad-blocking purposes.
The move to Manifest V3 introduces stricter guidelines for extensions, specifically prohibiting the use of remotely hosted code. Google justifies this change by stating that such code ‚Äúpresents security risks by allowing unreviewed code to be executed in extensions.‚Äù Under the new framework, extensions are only permitted to execute JavaScript which is part of the extension package itself, a policy aimed at reducing potential vulnerabilities.
For the more than 30 million users of uBlock Origin on Google Chrome, this update will result in significant disruption. Soon, an automatic update will disable the tool, and while users will have the option to re-enable it through Chrome‚Äôs settings temporarily, this option will eventually be removed entirely. Users will then face a choice: either switch to a different browser or find an alternative ad blocker that complies with the new Manifest V3 framework.
In response to these changes, the developers of uBlock Origin have introduced a new version of their app, aptly named uBlock Origin Lite. This version is fully compliant with Manifest V3, retaining many of the core ad-blocking features of the original.
However, it comes with some limitations‚Äîmost notably, it lacks support for dynamic filters used for blocking scriptlet injection, a key feature in the original version. This makes uBlock Origin Lite a more constrained tool, though still effective within the confines of the new framework.

title: Jornalista Luiz Afonso Carneiro morre aos 50 anos | Goi√°s | G1
text:
1 de 1 Jornalista Luiz Afonso Carneiro ‚Äî Foto: Arquivo pessoal/Christiano Cohen Jornalista Luiz Afonso Carneiro ‚Äî Foto: Arquivo pessoal/Christiano Cohen
O jornalista Luiz Afonso Carneiro morreu na quarta-feira (27) em Senador Canedo , na Regi√£o Metropolitana de Goi√¢nia. Ele tinha 50 anos e sofria de insufici√™ncia card√≠aca, segundo o irm√£o Christiano Afonso Carneiro Pereira. O jornalista foi enterrado na tarde desta quinta-feira (28), no Cemit√©rio Santana, em Goi√¢nia. Ele deixa um filho de 18 anos.
Compartilhe no WhatsApp Compartilhe no Telegram
"Ele tinha insufici√™ncia card√≠aca e teve um mal s√∫bito dormindo. Quando o caseiro foi cham√°-lo, o encontrou na cama sem vida‚Äù, contou o irm√£o de Luiz Afonso.
LEIA TAMB√âM
Secret√°rio de sa√∫de de Goian√©sia morre aos 38 anos Escritor Bariani Ort√™ncio morre aos 100 anos em Goi√¢nia Jornalista Batista Cust√≥dio morre em Goi√¢nia
De acordo com irm√£o, o jornalista morava na fazenda dos pais que vivem nos Estados Unidos e era respons√°vel por cuidar da propriedade.
"Meu irm√£o sempre foi um filho dedicado e morava na fazenda para cuidar das coisas dos nossos pais. Ele sempre foi muito respons√°vel e buscava trazer tranquilidade para a fam√≠lia‚Äù, afirma Christiano Afonso.
Nascido em Nova York, nos estados dos Estados Unidos, Luiz Afonso estudou jornalismo no pa√≠s e tamb√©m no Brasil. Ele era vice-presidente e chefe de reda√ß√£o do Jornal Goyaz e conforme o irm√£o, foi um jornalista dedicado e comprometido com a verdade.
"Ele sempre foi um jornalista vision√°rio, comprometido com a verdade dos fatos, dedicado ao trabalho e preocupado com as causas sociais. Ele tamb√©m sempre pautava as quest√µes em rela√ß√£o ao poder p√∫blico‚Äù, conta Christiano Afonso.
Para o irm√£o, o que fica do jornalista √© a alegria de trabalhar e contribuir para uma sociedade mais justa.
"O que fica dele √© a imagem de um ser um humano extremamente feliz e comprometido com o trabalho. Ele era um trabalhador dedicado, filho e pai exemplar. Fica o sorriso, a alegria de trabalhar e contribuir para uma sociedade mais justa‚Äù, afirma Christiano Afonso.
O prefeito de Goi√¢nia, Rog√©rio Cruz (Republicanos), divulgou uma nota lamentando a morte do jornalista. Confira abaixo:
√â com pesar que eu e minha fam√≠lia recebemos a not√≠cia do falecimento do jornalista Luiz Afonso Carneiro, 50 anos, vice-presidente e chefe de reda√ß√£o do Jornal Goyaz, nesta quinta-feira (28/12).
Expressamos as mais sinceras condol√™ncias pela perda do jornalista e nos solidarizamos com todos os familiares e amigos, para que nesse momento de tristeza e luto haja for√ßa, paz, conforto, e amor.

title: Watch Philippines typhoon disaster film winner of Earth Photo 24 award | New Scientist
text: Dreams of the Ravaged is a short documentary film about three young survivors of super-typhoon Odette (also known as Rai), a tropical cyclone that hit the Philippines in 2021 and killed over 400 people. The film, directed by [Breech Asher Harani](https://filmfreeway.com/BreechAsherHarani88), recently won the New Scientist Editors Award at the Earth Photo 2024 competition, alongside Taylor Roades‚Äôs images of a [river in north-west Alaska that had turned orange because of global warming](/article/mg26234960-400-photos-of-a-rusting-alaskan-river-win-new-scientist-editors-award/). Harani‚Äôs film imaginatively captures the lived experience of a natural disaster through interviews, news reports and animation, exploring life on a frontline of climate change, how this affects the psyche of those living there and how that might shape people‚Äôs views of the future. ‚ÄúThe concept of this film was inspired by my own personal experience as a survivor of super-typhoon Bopha,‚Äù says Harani of the 2012 event, also known as Pablo, that levelled his hometown in Davao De Oro. Working with the Californian government‚Äôs [mental health services oversight and accountability commission](https://mhsoac.ca.gov/) (MHSOAC), the goal of the film was to educate the public about the impacts of climate change on the mental health of those affected and tackle social, cultural and environmental issues in the southern Philippines. ‚ÄúI love highlighting people and communities who were never given a seat on the table when leaders and policy-makers create decisions regarding our local environment and ecosystem,‚Äù says Harani. Advertisement The winners and runners up of [Earth Photo 2024](https://www.earthphoto.world/) are on show at the Royal Geographical Society in London until 21 August. Topics:
